TopicTitle: RS-24 Yars ICBM with 9 mirv warheads (realistic)

Articles.Content:
The mighty RS-24 Yars is one og the Russian Federation's finest road mobile icbms... while technically not road mobile in KSP, I would respect anyonw who could create a truck and TEL for this...

This required Novapunch, FASA Gemini pack (with a custom modified Solid Booster Stage), and a custom W10 warhead made by someone long ago... (I'll add the lazor explosion script to it soon). To make it as realistic as possible, the first two stages are solid fueled, while there is a third post boost stage. Staging for the MIRV warheads have not been set up.

After a few modifications, I'll post the craft and its associated parts.
